column5: Hi Folks, looking at adding a track system for rod holders. Traxstech (formerly Pursuit) and Bert's custom tackle both look to have nice systmes. Any feedback on these systems (pros and cons) or other system suggestions would be greatly appreciated.  Thanks!

Trojan Tackle is a local fabricator of such systems, check it out.  http://www.trojantackle.ca  Traxstech and Bert's offer quality products as well.  Decide what your needs are and then award your business to the company who offers the best service & price.  Tony
If you haven't already, you can also have a look at Trojan Tackle. It's high quality stuff also and made in Burlington.
Thanks for the info, they look very good as well - however I don't see any pricing information on their website. I typically avoid retailers who don't provide price transparency.
